Quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
Author: Steve Jobs

Quote: Technology is just a tool. In terms of getting the kids working together and motivating them, the teacher is the most important.
Author: Bill Gates

Quote: Failure is an option here. If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough.
Author: Elon Musk

Quote: Move fast and break things. Unless you are breaking stuff, you are not moving fast enough.
Author: Mark Zuckerberg

Quote: I always did something I was a little not ready to do. I think that's how you grow.
Author: Marissa Mayer

Quote: We believe that technology can solve almost every problem, and it's up to us to make it happen.
Author: Tim Cook

Quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
Author: Sheryl Sandberg

Quote: Don't be a know-it-all; be a learn-it-all.
Author: Satya Nadella

Quote: If you don't understand the details of your business you are going to fail.
Author: Jeff Bezos

Quote: Innovation is taking two things that already exist and putting them together in a new way.
Author: Susan Wojcicki
